sen.j: 建武の新政は表面上は復古的であるが、内実は蒙古的な天皇専制を目指し、武家を排除した公家中心の政権運営を敷き、性急な改革、土地訴訟への対応の不備や恩賞の不公平、大内裏建設計画などその施策の大半が各方面、特に武士勢力の不満を呼び、また有名な二条河原の落書に観られるようにその無能を批判され、権威を全く失墜した。
sen.e: The Kenmu Restoration seems a reactionary movement, but was in fact an old and ignorant imperial dictatorship, and most of the measures introduced, such as an aristocracy-centered and samurai-excluded political management, introduction of an precipitated reform, inability to handle lawsuits for land, inequality in rewards, and the unreasonable Daidairi Construction Plan, caused discontents in various sectors, especially in the samurai class.
